projects.title: Automotive Mental Health PSA
projects.description: In the 2021-22 School Year, I wrote, produced, and edited a PSA about taking care of your mental health, with a twist.

projects.title: DTV Pacemaker Newscast
projects.description: In November of 2023, DTV was recognized as one of the best high school newscasts in the country. I directed and made graphics for our entry newscasts.
